body.p: I hope you are doing well after your treatment for prostate cancer. Our department is involved in several treatment methods for prostate cancer including open radical prostatectomy, laparoscopic radical prostatectomy, brachytherapy (seeds), and cryotherapy. We are carefully tracking quality of life outcomes through validated survey instruments that assess general and specific quality of life issues.

We thank you for filling the questionnaire out in the past. I would be most grateful for your time and effort in repeating that effort for the questionnaire that you recently received in the mail. It is important that each survey be completed and sent back to us. This way, we can accurately compare the patterns of recovery after treatment. All information is kept strictly confidential. Our research coordinator may contact you if we have not received a response from surveys we have mailed you. If you require any additional information or assistance with the questionnaire, please do not hesitate to contact Rhonda Sites at (757) 457-5165.

Hopefully, we will be able to make a difference for men faced with your situation of selecting treatment for prostate cancer. Thank you in advance for your assistance, and I look forward to seeing you in the office soon.
